alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Huerfano, southeastern Costilla and western Las Animas Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 313 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms over western Las Animas and southern Huerfano Counties. Movement of individual cells are northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Walsenburg, Aguilar, Cokedale, Starkville, Gulnare, Cuchara Pass, Stonewall, Hoehne, Spanish Peaks, Boncarbo, Model, Segundo and Weston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
